schema.description: Only with "enumerable" extension (and "allowances") Returns all allowances this owner has approved. Supports pagination. Return type: AllAllowancesResponse.
schema.title: All allowances

ui-schema.ui:title: All Allowances
ui-schema.ui:description: Retrieve a list of all allowances an owner has approved. Supports pagination for large sets of data.

ui:options.title: Query All Allowances
ui:options.description: Retrieve a list of all allowances an owner has approved. Supports pagination for large sets of data.

alerts.text: A maximum of 30 results can be returned in one request.

ui:options.title: Result Limit
ui:options.description: The maximum number of allowance records to return in a single query. Leave blank to use the default limit.
ui:options.help: If left empty, a default limit of 10 results will be applied. Values greater than 30 will default to the maximum of 30 results.

ui:options.title: Owner Address
ui:options.description: The wallet address of the owner whose allowances are being queried.
ui:options.help: Enter the wallet address of the owner to retrieve their approved allowances.

ui:options.title: Start After
ui:options.description: Begin the list of allowances after the specified allowance record, for pagination.
ui:options.help: Specify an allowance identifier to start the list after, for pagination purposes.
